review_data.title: Good Burger
review_data.content: Not a bad American style burger but like most things in Switzerland, very expensive especially if converted to AUD. Also, carful if you don’t t eat beef or pork, ask to have the pepperoni removed if you order chicken on the run. Overall, not bad.

review_data.title: After 2 weeks here this was perfect for our family!
review_data.content: We had a great meal here. Expensive for a burger but we didn’t care. It was a very American burger and that is what we wanted. Great service quick and we loved it.
